uvi.description:
media: firewire: firedtv-avc: fix a buffer overflow in avc_ca_pmt()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.1 by commit cb667140875a3b1db92e4c50b4617a7cbf84659b. For more details please see the references link.
